Marco Baroni writes:
> I keep receiving warnings like the following in the heritrix_out.log file:
> 
> java.io.IOException: Too many open files

What scope are you using? Which platform? How many seeds?

> Moreover, after half hour or so, typically crawling becomes very slow,
> which I suspect is related to the above warning.

Check the thread report and frontier reports to see where things are
holding up. If you have only a few seeds it may well be the case that
all but one or two have been crawled and you are waiting on the
remainder to finish.
